DOC.brief_summary: This study design test bioequivalence assume key active compound vs. natural fruit extract judge Incremental area curve ( +iAUC0-2h ) blood glucose : i.e . 90 % confidence interval ratio +iAUC0-2h blood glucose assume key active compound vs. natural extract fall 0.8 - 1.25 .
DOC.brief_title: Natural Fruit Extract Versus Assumed Key Active Compound Reducing Post-prandial Blood Glucose Level
DOC.detailed_description: The basic study design Williams design consist six distinct treatment sequence ; within treatment sequence treatment duplicate .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 18.5 ≤ 25.0 kg/m2 . Apparently healthy male female : medical condition might affect study measurement , absorption , metabolism distribution ( include diabetes type 1 type 2 , gastrointestinal dysfunction , gastrointestinal surgery [ exception cholecystectomy appendectomy ] inflammatory disease ) . Fasting blood glucose value subject ≥ 3.4 < 6.1 mmol/litre ( i.e . 62 110 mg/dl ) screening . Use antibiotic within 3 month day 1 ; use medication within 14 day day 1 except paracetamol hormonal contraception .
